channel.title: Emacs on Cloud Nine
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on Cloud Nine

item.title: Time To Think About A New Job?
item.description: Hang Around The Barbershop Long Enough And You're Bound To Get A Haircut It can be a challenge on the job market, right? You’re fighting for a new position. The competition is everywhere. They’re young fast and strong. How are you going to make it in this new world? Can you adapt? The answer is that you can adapt. Everyone Can. But you need to keep a positive attitude. keep a positive attitude!
